snippet: Afghan villagers brought to testify at a sentencing hearing in the United States described a night of bloodshed inflicted by a soldier who killed 16 civilians.
abstract: Afghan villagers brought to United States to testify at sentencing hearing for Staff Sgt Robert Bales describe night of bloodshed in which Bales killed 16 civilians, most of them women and children; Bales has pleaded guilty to charges to avoid death penalty.
lead_paragraph: Afghan villagers brought to testify at a sentencing hearing in the United States described a night of bloodshed inflicted by a soldier who killed 16 civilians.
